name: ZFS Pool Status
description: Checks that all ZFS pools are healthy; attempts to clear transient errors if degraded.
check_cmd: if command -v zpool >/dev/null 2>&1; then if zpool status -x 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'all pools are healthy'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v zpool >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo '⚠️ ZFS pool degraded — attempting clear...'; zpool clear -a 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 3; if zpool status -x 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'all pools are healthy'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
